title: Rehab (Rihanna song)
summary: "Rehab" is a song recorded by Barbadian singer Rihanna for her third studio album, Good Girl Gone Bad (2007). Def Jam Recordings serviced the song to contemporary hit radio in the United States on October 6,Â 2008, as the eighth and final single from the album. It was released in the United Kingdom as a CD single on December 8, 2008.
